body: On the heels of a horrific car crash in which two young people lost their lives, KnowTnT.com blogs about "three elements that cumulatively share in the complicity of this tragedy."
original_body: On the heels of a horrific car crash in which two young people lost their lives, KnowTnT.com blogs about "three elements that cumulatively share in the complicity of this tragedy."
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Young People Die in Car Accident
